The following notices describe how code from 3rd parties was re-used.

3rd party notices follow.  Separator provided for convenience.

================================================================================

The following was integrated by Sam Gleske from 3rd parties:

    Original theme from:
    https://github.com/mojombo/mojombo.github.io

    Site theme forked from:
    https://github.com/joearms/joearms.github.com

    Categories and tags implementation from:
    https://github.com/minddust/minddust.github.io
    http://www.minddust.com/post/tags-and-categories-on-github-pages/

Sam Gleske implemented the following additional components for this blog:

- Makefile integration for performing complex tasks with simple make commands.
- CI / CD integration.  e.g. site building, grammar checking, gpg sig checking,
  history checking.
- Added last updated links for blog posts.
- Timezone for blog posts which tracks last updated in the author's local time
  zone.
- Added support for writing blog posts in GitHub Flavored Markdown.
- Added the following social integrations:
  - Disqus
  - GitHub
  - Keybase.io
  - Twitter
